name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D配信】４周年記念ミニライブ【＃ときのそら4周年】 [s7hakOSsU-I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song "Only my Railgun" by Tokino Sora and AZKi.
MC section where Sora and AZKi talk about their history together and the song selection.

subtitles.original: 立ち止まると少しだけ感じる切なさに
subtitles.english: In the brief sadness I feel when I stand still

subtitles.original: 戸惑うことないなんて嘘はつかないよ
subtitles.english: I won't lie and say I'm never confused

subtitles.original: 空に舞うコインが描く放物線が決める運命
subtitles.english: The fate decided by the parabola drawn by a coin dancing in the sky

subtitles.original: 打ち出した答えが今日も私の胸を駆け巡る
subtitles.english: The answer I shot out still races through my chest today

subtitles.original: Sparking! The shiny lights awake true desire Only my railgun can shoot it 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Sparking! The shiny lights awake true desire. Only my railgun can shoot it, right now

subtitles.original: 貫いてく戸惑うことなく傷ついても走り続ける
subtitles.english: Piercing through without confusion, I'll keep running even if I get hurt

subtitles.original: Believe in it 煌めく視線は狂いなく闇を切り裂く
subtitles.english: Believe in it, my sparkling gaze cuts through the darkness without straying

subtitles.original: 迷いなんて吹き飛ばせばいいこの心が叫ぶ限り
subtitles.english: Just blow away any hesitation, as long as this heart is screaming

subtitles.original: 誰一人邪魔などさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in the way

subtitles.original: 儚く舞う数多の願いはこの両手に積もっていく
subtitles.english: Countless fleeting wishes pile up in these hands

subtitles.original: 切り裂く闇に見えてくるのは重く深く切ない記憶
subtitles.english: What I see in the darkness I cut through are heavy, deep, and painful memories

subtitles.original: 色褪せてく現実に揺れる絶望には負けたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to lose to the despair swaying in the fading reality

subtitles.original: 私がいま私であること胸を張って全て誇れる
subtitles.english: I can proudly take pride in everything about who I am now

subtitles.original: Looking for the special radiance that stays Only my railgun can shoot it 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Looking for the special radiance that stays. Only my railgun can shoot it, right now

subtitles.original: 体中を光の速さで駆け巡った確かな予感
subtitles.english: The definite premonition that raced through my body at the speed of light

subtitles.original: 放て！心に刻んだ夢を未来さえ置き去りにして
subtitles.english: Fire! Leaving even the future behind, the dream carved in my heart

subtitles.original: 限界など知らない意味ないこの力が光散らす
subtitles.english: Meaningless to know limits, this power scatters light

subtitles.original: その先に遥かな想いを
subtitles.english: Sending my distant thoughts beyond that

subtitles.original: そらちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Sora-chan!

subtitles.original: あずきちー！
subtitles.english: AZKi-chi!

subtitles.original: すごい緊張してた。
subtitles.english: I was so nervous.

subtitles.original: 改めて4周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Once again, happy 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: もう4周年かー。いや、すごい、本当に本当に。
subtitles.english: Has it been 4 years already? Wow, amazing, really, really.

subtitles.original: 5年目か。5年目のそらちゃん。
subtitles.english: The 5th year. Sora-chan in her 5th year.

subtitles.original: そうだよ、もう5年目だよ。
subtitles.english: That's right, it's already the 5th year.

subtitles.original: 5年目のそらちゃん。めちゃくちゃ大先輩だ。
subtitles.english: Sora-chan in her 5th year. She's a huge senior.

subtitles.original: 5歳だ。
subtitles.english: I'm 5 years old.

subtitles.original: 5歳だ。そうやって言うと、一気に子供みたいな。
subtitles.english: 5 years old. When you put it like that, you suddenly sound like a kid.

subtitles.original: 5歳になりましたーって。
subtitles.english: I've turned 5 years old!

subtitles.original: 今日は呼んでくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for inviting me today!

subtitles.original: とても嬉しい。なんかこんな素敵な、なんだ、ライブで、SorAZで今日歌えるなんて。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy. To be able to sing as SorAZ today in such a wonderful live concert...

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ嬉しくて、嬉しくて、嬉しくて。
subtitles.english: I'm just so, so, so happy.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: いや、あずきちともね。もう結構長いよね。
subtitles.english: Well, it's been quite a long time with AZKi-chi too.

subtitles.original: ね、そうだよね。もう何年、何年だろう。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's true. How many, how many years has it been?

subtitles.original: 最初になんかSorAZでライブしたのが、でもなんか昨日のことのように。
subtitles.english: The first time we did a SorAZ live feels like it was just yesterday.

subtitles.original: でも、もう3年前とかじゃない？
subtitles.english: But wasn't it like 3 years ago?

subtitles.original: だよね。そうだよ、きっと。
subtitles.english: Right. Yeah, it must be.

subtitles.original: そんな、そう。最初ね、だから最初さ...
subtitles.english: Yeah. At first, you know, at first...

subtitles.original: なんか「そら先輩」って呼んでて。
subtitles.english: I used to call you "Sora-senpai".

subtitles.original: 今では考えられない！
subtitles.english: Unthinkable now!

subtitles.original: 考えられない。今「そら先輩」って言われたら「えっ」ってなっちゃう。
subtitles.english: Unthinkable. If I were called "Sora-senpai" now, I'd be like, "Huh?"

subtitles.original: そう、そら先輩って呼んでて、で、なんか...
subtitles.english: Yeah, I called you Sora-senpai, and then...

subtitles.original: そらちゃんが、なんか「そらちゃんって呼んで」っていうのを、そのライブで多分言ってくれて。
subtitles.english: Sora-chan probably told me to call her "Sora-chan" during that live.

subtitles.original: あ、そうだ。ライブで言ったんだっけ？
subtitles.english: Oh, that's right. Did I say that at the live?

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。そっか。
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah. I see.

subtitles.original: それすら記憶に...
subtitles.english: Even that's not in my memory...

subtitles.original: 当たり前かのように「そらちゃん」って呼んでいますけれども、そんなそんなこともあったなと思って。
subtitles.english: I call you "Sora-chan" as if it's the most natural thing now, but I was thinking how there was a time like that.

subtitles.original: そっからいろいろね、一緒にほら歌ってみたとかね。
subtitles.english: From there, we did various things together, like song covers.

subtitles.original: 確かに。
subtitles.english: True.

subtitles.original: 意外とだから、いっぱいいろんな歌歌ってるんだけど。
subtitles.english: So, surprisingly, we've sung many different songs.

subtitles.original: そうなんだ、そうなんだ。今回のこの曲は、
subtitles.english: That's right, that's right. This song this time...

subtitles.original: あ、そう。この選曲は、そらちゃんが聞きたかった。
subtitles.english: Oh, right. As for this song choice, I wanted to hear it, Sora-chan.

subtitles.original: なんか一緒に歌いたいなってなったときに、
subtitles.english: When I felt like I wanted to sing together...

subtitles.original: どうせだったら二人で歌ったことがない曲と思って、で考えてたの。
subtitles.english: I thought I'd choose a song we've never sung together, so I was thinking about it.

subtitles.original: で、実は、そのときにあずきちの歌とかを全部聴いてて。
subtitles.english: And actually, at that time, I was listening to all of AZKi-chi's songs.

subtitles.original: で、そう、リストとかと照らし合わせて。
subtitles.english: And yeah, comparing them with the list.

subtitles.original: そのときに「only my railgun」を歌ってる...これ結構前だよね、これも。
subtitles.english: At that time, I saw you singing "only my railgun"... This was quite a while ago too, right?

subtitles.original: そうだね、だいぶ前かもしれない。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it might have been a long time ago.

subtitles.original: のを見て「あ、かっこいい。あ、これだ」って。
subtitles.english: I saw that and thought, "Oh, cool. This is it!"
